description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Bluetooth driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2023-24948):

1. Download and apply the updates listed below specific to your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5026368](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5026368)
   - For Windows 10 (x64): [KB5026382](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5026382)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5026361](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5026361)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates resolve an elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows Bluetooth driver. 
- Ensure the system is running the correct version before applying the update.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
